## TableColumnHookResult interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TableColumnHookResult
```

## Properties

| Property                                                            | Modifiers | Type    | Description                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [initialWidth?](./extensions.tablecolumnhookresult.initialwidth.md) |           | number  | _(Optional)_ The initial width of the column.                |
| [isAvailable](./extensions.tablecolumnhookresult.isavailable.md)    |           | boolean | Indicates the availability of the column in the table.       |
| [isResizable](./extensions.tablecolumnhookresult.isresizable.md)    |           | boolean | Indicates whether the column width can be manually adjusted. |
| [minWidth?](./extensions.tablecolumnhookresult.minwidth.md)         |           | number  | _(Optional)_ The minimum width that the column can have.     |
| [title](./extensions.tablecolumnhookresult.title.md)                |           | string  | Title associated with the column.                            |
